fields.label: Show start screen
fields.description: If checked, the content will show the title screen when starting.

fields.label: Marker image (original)
fields.description: Upload the image that you want to create a marker for. Should be a square image or it will be cropped.

fields.label: Marker image (pattern)
fields.description: Download this image to use as a marker displayed on a screen or printed on paper.

fields.label: Action type
fields.description: Action that should be triggered when the marker is found.

fields.label: 3D model file
fields.description: Upload a glTF (.glb / .gltf) file here. The preferred format is "glTF 2.0 binary" in a single file.

fields.label: Scale
fields.description: Scale the model up or down to match your marker size.

fields.label: Position
fields.description: Set the model's offset position relative to the marker.

fields.label: Show end screen
fields.description: If checked, show an end screen when all interactions have been completed.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Enable "Retry" button
fields.description: If checked, learners can retry the task.

fields.label: Enable "Solutions" button
fields.description: If checked, learners can view the solutions of all interactions.

fields.label: Fallback height
fields.description: Set a fallback heigth in px for cases when there are cross orgin resource sharing (CORS) issues.

fields.label: Find a marker to see an interaction.
fields.default: Find a marker to see an interaction.

fields.label: Error: browser not supported
fields.default: It seems that your browser cannot run this content type, unfortunately.

fields.label: Error: No camera support
fields.default: Your browser does not seem to support a camera.

fields.label: Error: No markers
fields.default: Did someone forget to add markers?

fields.label: Warning: Brave browser
fields.default: You seem to be using the Brave browser. Nice! But its strict privacy settings may prevent the camera from working.

fields.label: Initialiting content
fields.default: Initializing content. Please don't forget to allow camera access.

fields.label: 'Button disabled' message
fields.default: You cannot switch the view right now

fields.label: 'Button disabled' message
fields.default: You have not yet completed all exercises

fields.label: Action opened
fields.default: The view has switched to an exercise.

fields.label: Action closed
fields.default: The view has switched to the camera.
